name: Blaze or Touse
description:
Become a one-gnome army, ready to take on a barrage of ice-cold shooting stars coming from outer space.

Your weapons of choice are:

  • a full bag of military-grade fiery flower seeds, just waiting to be planted
  • one trusty all-purpose shovel to dig up holes and uproot unwanted flowers
  • a three-charge watering can to provide seeds and seedlings with an instant growth-inducing nutrition

Use these tools to turn up the heat on the incoming meteorites and withstand their frigid onslaught, but keep an eye on your temperature. You are not as cold-resistant as your flaming flowers, and a blazing heat is just as fatal as a bone-chilling cold.

Good luck!

This is ten percent code, fifty percent art
Thirty percent fixing what has fallen apart
Ten percent leisure, trying to stay sane
And a little to no time to playtest my own game (Sike!)
